definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: empty (cf. probably Ar. baq=a make a gurgling noise, of a mug dipped in water, or emptied of water)—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. [[וּבַקּׂתִ֫י]] Je 19:7, [[בָּֽקֲקוּ]] Na 2:3; Pt. [[בּוֹקֵק]] Is 24:1, [[בִּקֲקִים]] Na 2:3; empty, lay waste land, acc., Is 24:1, Na 2:3, also abs. v:Na 2:3; fig. make void (obj. [[עֵעֶה]]) Je 19:7.

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Pf. [[וְנׇֽבְקָה]] (cf. Ges:§ 67, R. 11) Is 19:3; Impf. 3 fs. [[תִּבּוֹק]] Is 24:3; Inf. abs. [[הִבּוֹק]] Is 24:3; —be emptied (laid waste) Is 24:3 [[הִבּוֹק תִבּוֹק]], of land (‖[[הִבּוֹז]] [[יִבּוֹו]]); fig. of spirit, courage Is 19:3.
